VIDEO_INPUTS_PARAMS.usbcam: v4l2src device=/dev/video0 ! video/x-raw, framerate=30/1, width=640, height=480 ! videoconvert ! appsink
VIDEO_INPUTS_PARAMS.raspberrycam: nvarguscamerasrc ! video/x-raw(memory:NVMM),width=1280, height=720, framerate=119/1, format=NV12 ! nvvidconv ! video/x-raw, format=BGRx, width=640, height=360 ! videoconvert ! video/x-raw, format=BGR ! appsink
VIDEO_INPUTS_PARAMS.remote_hls_gstreamer: souphttpsrc location=https://stream.myt.mu/prod/CAUDAN_NORTH.stream_720p/playlist.m3u8 ! hlsdemux ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! videoscale ! video/x-raw,width=1280,height=720 ! appsink
VIDEO_INPUTS_PARAMS.remote_hls_gstreamer_rpi: souphttpsrc location=https://stream.myt.mu/prod/CAUDAN_NORTH.stream_720p/playlist.m3u8 is-live=true ! hlsdemux ! queue ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! videoscale ! video/x-raw,width=640,height=480 ! appsink
